questions: What is the recommended way to create a Tracardi GUI cluster?
What should be done if there are two separate clusters for internal and external traffic?
How should the GUI be configured to connect to the cluster handling internal traffic?
answer:
# Tracardi GUI cluster
Tracardi GUI cluster should be created the same way the API cluster. If you have 2 separate clusters for internal and
external traffic remember to configure GUI to connect to cluster handling internal traffic.
